p.span: Discovers all saved searches that use Extreme Search commands and displays results in a table.

Looks for saved searches that use Extreme Search commands: xsWhere, xsFindBestConcept, xsCreateUDContext, xsCreateDDContext, xsCreateADContext, xsCreateCDContext, xsUpdateUDContext, xsUpdateDDContext, xsGetCompatibility, xsDiscoverTrend, xsDisplayWhere, xsGetWhereCIX, xsNormalize, xsFindMembership,
The result for xsListSearches is displayed in table format.

html.p:
